sequence:
Zara Character Story - Storia di Rosa

<size=45>Chapter 5: Devil's Whispers</size>

scripts.say: Port - Office
Break time, Commander. Put your work down.

options.content: Ask her to clean your ears.

scripts.say: Hehe... Is there anything your secretary can do for you? Just say the first thing on your mind.
Huh? Clean your ears? I guess I can try.
I figured this was a good way to see another side of Zara.
<size=30>Hehehe~</size>
Now then, come rest your head right here on my lap. Don't be nervous, just relax.
Ah, that's it, and put this on for me.
It was an eye mask. I didn't know what she was up to, but I decided to go along with her anyway.
Alright, here we go. Don't move, Commander~
I felt something hard and metallic press against my ear.
Zara's earpick made slow gentle circles around the edge of my ear, before gently making its way inside.
The contrast of my ear rejecting a foreign object against the tingly pleasure of the earpick sliding through my narrow ear canal was an indescribable experience.
The earpick rubbed up against the deepest part of my ear, where Zara started to slowly and gently twist it around. The tiny circular motions lightly tickled the sensitive nerves near my eardrum.
Waves of pleasure surged from my ear, washing over my brain and sending tingles out over my entire head. With my vision blocked by the eye mask, the feelings were only that much more intense.
I began to lose consciousness as I drowned in the soothing joy of Zara's ear cleaning...
Nau~ghty~
Huh?!
Her breathy whisper flooded my brain with pleasure, making every nerve from my neck up cry out in ecstasy.
I suddenly realized I had once again played right into Zara's hands. She had me trapped, completely at her mercy.
Commander, you're not allowed to fall asleep until after I'm done. Okay? Hehehe.
